CustomField.description: [MakeItYours] Pairing Id used to link several firm orders in the same Opportunity with the same Material/Color belonging to the same product range (for example, if a client ordered 3 firm orders: 2 Rialto shoes in Crocodile in blue color + 1 Rialto Belt in Crocodile in blue color => there is a pairing between these 3 firm orders to reuse the same material/color between manufacturing systems). Format: APZZ-X/YÂ - ZZ: pairing number - X: index - Y: total Ex: AP01-1/2, AP01-2/2 (pairing id is unique in the same order but another order can have the same pairing id)
CustomField.label: Pairing Id
